title: Closures: Anonymous Functions That Capture Their Environment
description: In this lab, you will explore closures in Rust, which are anonymous functions that can be saved in variables or passed as arguments, allowing for code reuse and behavior customization by capturing values from their defining scope.

meta.title: Closures: Anonymous Functions That Capture Their Environment
meta.description: Explore Rust's closures, anonymous functions that can capture values from their defining scope for code reuse and behavior customization.
meta.keywords: rust playground, closures, anonymous functions, rust tutor, rust online compiler, behavior customization, rust commands, rust practice, rust online, rust online playground
